title: Change hero section text to black color

requirements.summary: Change text color of company name, tagline, and description in HeroSection to black
acceptanceCriteria: The company name 'Gadin Technologies' in the hero section is rendered in black.
The tagline 'Nature's Finest Foxnuts, Delivered Worldwide' in the hero section is rendered in black.
The description paragraph starting with 'We source and export premium-grade foxnuts...' in the hero section is rendered in black.
No other text colors on the page are affected by this change.

file_operations.description: Update the text color styling for the company name heading, tagline subheading, and description paragraph to black. Change the existing text color classes (likely text-white or similar) to text-black for these three specific text elements while preserving all other styling, layout, background overlays, and CTA button styles.
